description: One day, a Digimon Xros Loader appears before http://anidb.net/ch17981 [Taiki], an exceptionally warmhearted seventh grader, along with http://anidb.net/ch17974 [Shoutmon]`s voice, asking for his help. The D Xros Loader is an essential item that is capable of transferring power to Digimon by means of "DigiXros". He was chosen as a "General" to control it. Taiki and his friends are thrown into a parallel universe, the Digital World. Due to the appearance of rival and enemy Digimon, the Digital World has been driven into a state of "Xros Wars", a large-scale war with battles like those of the Sengoku period. Taiki and Shoutmon form a Digimon Army using the D Xros Loader and battle against formidable opponents with "DigiXros".

REGULAR.description:
Taiki Kudou is an uncommonly good-hearted seventh grader who "can`t turn his back on" someone in a pinch. One day he follows the voice of a Digimon in need and is granted a Xros Loader, a device that allows him to give Digimon added strength through the command "DigiXros!" Taiki becomes a General and is sent with his two friends to the Digital World, which is currently ravaged by war between the Digimon. Taiki and Shoutmon, the Digimon he saved, use the Xros Loader to build up a new army and join in the battle against the attacking Digimon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: タイキ, 異世界へ行く!

REGULAR.description:
When Taiki visits Shoutmon`s home, the Village of Smiles, he sees that war has plunged the Digital World into chaos. Shoutmon begs Taiki to stay and fight the enemy with him, but Taiki`s reply creates a rift between the two. Meanwhile, the Imperial Bagra Army launches another attack on Taiki and his friends...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シャウトモン, 吠える!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki has decided to stay with Shoutmon and his other Digimon friends, but when the Bagra Army learns that Taiki can make Digimon DigiXros using the Xros Loader, they initiate attempts to eliminate him. Meanwhile another boy who uses a Xros Loader, Kiriha, shows up and tries to coerce Taiki into working for him...
Source: crunchyroll

After Taiki defeats the Bagra Army`s champion, MadLeomon, by uniting Shoutmon X2 and Dorulumon through a DigiXros, a golden fragment descends from the sky before his eyes. A mysterious girl named Nene Amano appears and tells him it is a fragment of the Code Crown, an object that allows its owner to control the Digital World. Following Nene`s instructions, Taiki places the Code Crown in his Xros Loader and travels to another Zone, unaware that the Bagra Army is taking secret measures to obtain the Code Crown as well...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アイランドゾーン, 激動!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki and his team arrive in the Island Zone intent on finding more Code Crown fragments. Meanwhile, the Bagra Army learns that the Island Zone`s Code Crown is inside the belly of Whamon, the great Digimon who carries the Island Zone on his back, and tries to feed him explosives to stun him so they can steal it. Taiki and Shoutmon dive into Whamon`s belly themselves to find the Code Crown first, but the Bagra Army`s Flymon squad is close behind...
Source: crunchyroll

Taiki and his team have acquired another Code Crown as well as DigiMemories, cards containing the data of legendary Digimon - but now the Bagra Army has them surrounded! Kiriha hears this and offers to save Taiki`s team in exchange for the DigiMemories, but Taiki refuses and summons the DigiMemory of MarineAngemon in order to reach the enemy ship. There he attempts to rescue the chief of the Island Zone, Archelomon, who is held captive by the Bagra Army...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: x4(クロスフォー), 危機突破!

REGULAR.description:
After defeating the Bagra Army again, Taiki`s team heads to the Magma Zone. When the team is attacked by more Bagra troops led by DeathMeramon, Dorulumon dashes in to save them. Taiki asks Dorulumon to travel with them, but he refuses and leaves again with Cutemon. Later Taiki learns that the local Digimon are being forced into slavery by the Bagra Army and sets off into a cave to rescue them, but he`s found by the Bagra Army and the giant volcano Digimon, AncientVolcamon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 火山デジモン, 大爆発!

REGULAR.description:
The Bagra Army has been forcing the Digimon of the Magma Zone to search for the Zone`s Code Crown. Taiki fights to rescue them, but he`s met by a Digimon of overwhelming power, AncientVolcamon! Taiki and his companions let themselves be arrested to find out where the prison is, and team up with the prisoners to attempt an escape. However, when the Bagra Army`s leader Tactimon hears that Taiki and Dorulumon have been captured, he appears to confirm the story personally - and tells Taiki`s team all about Dorulumon`s past...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Fierce General Tactimon Closes In!
猛将タクティモン, 迫る!

REGULAR.description:
Tactimon arrives in the Magma Zone and tells Taiki a shocking story of Dorulumon`s past: he used to be a prodigal warrior in the Bagra Army who conquered many Zones as Tactimon`s right hand man! He calls Dorulumon a traitor, but Taiki still chooses to trust him. They eventually escape from their cage and face AncientVolcamon, who has grown even stronger after absorbing his own allies. Dorulumon and Shoutmon DigiXros to fight him and try to return peace to the Magma Zone for good!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドルルモン, 風に駆ける!

REGULAR.description:
Xros Heart arrives in the Lake Zone, where Taiki saves Knightmon, a Digimon that had fallen into a frozen lake amidst a Bagra Army attack. A grateful Knightmon takes Taiki to the castle to have him made the captain of its knights, but the princess Bastemon has already chosen someone for that position: Taiki`s rival Kiriha! The two of them must join forces in order to turn back the Bagra Army attacking the castle, but the exhaustion of the battle finally gets to Taiki in the end...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: タイキ, 騎士(ナイト)になる!

REGULAR.description:
With Taiki unconscious from exhaustion, Zenjirou leads the counterattack against the Bagra Army in his place. Meanwhile Bastemon keeps a constant watch over Taiki, leaving Akari feeling a bit like a third wheel. A dejected Akari is then lured by a vision of her mother in a mirror, which turns out to be the magic of Lilithmon telling Akari she`ll help her return to the human world in exchange for the Lake Zone`s Code Crown. As Akari searches for the Code Crown, Lilithmon awakens a secret weapon to launch her ultimate attack on the castle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: クロスハート, 燃える!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki and his team arrive in the Sand Zone, which once thrived as an area rich in precious gems. They decide to take a shot at treasure hunting, but along the way they fall into the Bagra Army`s underground base and find themselves on the run. They are saved by a treasure hunter Digimon, Revolmon, who then insists that they return the favor by helping him hunt for treasure. They set off into the ruins where the treasure is said to be hidden, but are impeded by various traps and pursued yet again by the Bagra Army. At last they reach the final chamber, where the mysterious Digimon Pharaohmon awaits them...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sand Zone and the Great Adventure in the Ruins!
サンドゾーン, 遺跡で大冒険!

REGULAR.description:
As they leave the ruins of the Sand Zone, Taiki`s team finds themselves under fire from the Bagra Army`s assassin, Baalmon. Then a shock wave from the battle between Kiriha, Nene, and Blastmon sends Taiki and Baalmon tumbling into the sacred underground temple of a goddess. When Taiki extends a hand to the goddess statue he finds there, it emits a light that envelops him, which stuns Baalmon. He reveals that the light is called "the light of the Goddess," and those it shines upon have been chosen as "Warriors of the Goddess."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: タイキ, 女神の戦士!

REGULAR.description:
Baalmon, the survivor of the order of Warriors of the Goddess, falls victim to Lilithmon`s poison. Taiki begins a ritual to revive him using the Xros Loader, which prevents the others from using it to DigiXros in the battle against Lilithmon`s minion. Eventually, Baalmon stops the ritual and sends Taiki to help his companions, saving them but dooming himself to certain death...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 戦士ベルゼブモン, 舞う!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki`s team arrives in the Heaven Zone, a home to many angel type Digimon and a police force so strong that even the Bagra Army can`t lay a hand on them. But the president and chief of police, SlashAngemon, and his subordinates are abusing their authority, punishing the smallest of crimes with severe sentences. Taiki`s companion Dondokomon is almost arrested for making a racket when he`s saved by a local Digimon, Lucemon, but then Taiki and his friends are seized again for a crime they didn`t commit, and SlashAngemon prepares to deal them a harsh sentence...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヘブンゾーン, 楽園の罠!

REGULAR.description:
Lucemon is elected the new president of Heaven Zone, but the citizens` hopes for peace are quickly betrayed. The moment Lucemon is presented with the armband that symbolizes the presidency, he reveals the evil true nature he had been hiding all along! He uses an incantation to split the Zone and release the airborne shrine in which the Code Crown was sealed. Once he obtains the Code Crown, he returns to his true evil form and reveals that he is a servant of Lilithmon. The stunned Taiki is then faced with the appearance of Nene and a dark knight Digimon...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 黒騎士デジモン, 参上!

REGULAR.description:
The evil Lucemon absorbs all the dark power sealed in the Heaven Zone, even drawing in Nene in the process. Her partner Sparrowmon tries to save her, but his attacks have no effect and he refuses to cooperate with Taiki and Shoutmon. When Lucemon starts to absorb the Heaven Zone itself and all the Digimon in it, Taiki`s team tries to stop him, but can`t reach him since Shoutmon X4 can`t fly. Sparrowmon finally sees that Taiki`s intentions are true and agrees to DigiXros with Shoutmon X4, giving rise to Shoutmon X5!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki no Digi Cross! Shoutmon Cross Five Tobu!
The Miraculous DigiXros! Shoutmon X5 Soars!
奇跡のデジクロス! シャウトモンX5(クロスファイブ)飛ぶ!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki`s team reaches the Forest Zone, a home of some very powerful Digimon. Akari and Zenjirou wind up separated from Taiki, so Dorulumon and Revolmon set off into the forest to find them. Then Akari and Zenjirou meet Stingmon, the protector of the forest, and Lilamon, who mistakes them for a dating couple. She takes them to a sacred shrine guarded by a barrier to protect them from the Bagra Army. Meanwhile Taiki`s team encounters Tactimon and fights him with Shoutmon X4B. They prove to be an even match, but then Kiriha and Nene appear and begin to attack Stingmon and Lilamon...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Stingmon, Hero of the Digimon Jungle
スティングモン, デジモン大密林(ジャングル)の勇者

REGULAR.description:
Taiki and his friends are caught up in a massive conflict between the Bagra Army, Team Blue Flare led by Kiriha, and Team Twilight led by Nene in the Forest Zone. Nene and DarkKnightmon head for the shrine in the forest to find the powerful sacred Digimon, Deckerdramon, and add him to their ranks. Taiki follows with Shoutmon X4 to save Nene, and Kiriha joins him, but they struggle against DarkKnightmon`s overwhelming power. Meanwhile, in response to Taiki`s questioning, Nene mentions the name "Yuu"... who could Yuu be?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 伝説のデッカードラモン, 動く!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki`s team transports to the Dust Zone, a world full of garbage and scrap, to save Nene. But Taiki`s Xros Loader is soon stolen by a group of ToyAgumon, who receive sustenance from a Bagra Army servant, GrandLocomon, in exchange for "mecha" found among the garbage. They then meet a Digimon called Pinocchimon, who takes them to the ToyAgumon - but when Taiki demands his Xros Loader back, Pinocchimon snatches it and disappears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dust Zone, GrandLocomon no Dai Scrap Toshi!
Dust Zone, GrandLocomon`s Giant Scrap City!
ダストゾーン, グランドロコモンの大スクラップ都市!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki`s team has arrived in the Dust Zone to rescue Nene, but they are soon attacked by Kiriha, who is now under DarkKnightmon`s control. Sparrowmon then arrives and tells them Nene has been imprisoned by DarkKnightmon, who is holding her brother hostage to force her into helping him gather dark power to activate the Darkness Loader. What is the Darkness Loader, and how will Taiki retaliate against Kiriha?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Decisive Battle! DarkKnightmon VS Xros Heart!
決戦! ダークナイトモン VS クロスハート!

REGULAR.description:
While advancing to the next Zone after saving Nene, Xros Heart runs into Arkadimon, a Digimon that catches travelers between Zones and feeds upon their data. Arkadimon turns out to be controlled by Lilithmon in a plot to steal the Xros Loader. While all the others and the Xros Loader are taken away, Taiki is left to drift about the Digital realm alone - until he`s found by Wisemon, a Digimon seeking answers to all the mysteries of the Digital World. Wisemon proceeds to tell Taiki all about the history and structure of the Digital World...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wisemon, The Secret of the Digital World!
ワイズモン, デジタルワールドの秘密!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki`s team arrives at the Monitamons` homeland, the Shinobi Zone, but it has also been attacked by the Bagra Army, who took their castle and kidnapped their princess. Mushamon of the Bagra Army demands the Zone`s Code Crown in return for the princess, so Taiki and a team of dropout Monitamons set off for the shrine where the Code Crown is kept. However, when they reach the shrine, they learn that the only way to obtain the Code Crown is to make a Digimon called Karatenmon laugh. They show him funny videos, jokes, comedy routines, and even funny DigiXros combinations, but Karatenmon is a tough audience! Can anyone manage to make him laugh and obtain the Code Crown?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinobi Zone and the Comic Ninja Battle!
シノビゾーン, お笑い忍者バトル!

REGULAR.description:
After obtaining the Shinobi Zone`s Code Crown, Taiki and his friends attempt to recover the princess held captive by Mushamon. However, Mushamon`s army breaks their agreement to exchange the princess for the Code Crown, and launches a night attack on the Monitamons` village. While Taiki and the others stay behind to stall them, Zenjirou, Dorulumon, and the less competent Monitamons of the village set off on a rescue mission. But can Zenjirou really stand up to the task of rescuing the princess?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Drop-Out Monitormonz Do Their Best!
落ちこぼれモニタモンズ, がんばる!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki`s team arrives at the Disc Zone, a land built of many layers of giant light discs. There they find Kiriha, who has obtained the Zone`s Code Crown, in a fierce battle with Blastmon of the Bagra Army. However, the Disc Zone is ancient and its land weak, meaning if their intense battle continues, the whole Zone will collapse. Taiki and Shoutmon X4K try to stop the fighting, but just then, the ground beneath them caves in! Blastmon, Shoutmon, Greymon, and MailBirdramon fall in, leaving their respective teams without their central fighting force as the Bagra Army sends a powerful new enemy, Bulbmon, into the battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zone Destruction! Taiki and Kiriha Send Sparks Flying!
Zone Houkai! Hibana Chiru Taiki to Kiriha!
ゾーン崩壊! 火花散るタイキとキリハ!

REGULAR.description:
After the Disc Zone`s collapse, its residents along with Taiki`s team all take refuge in the Shinobi Zone. But soon shards of Blastmon`s crystals, which had stuck to the Digimon`s bodies after the battle, turn into a doppelganger of Blastmon and begin to attack! Shoutmon manages to defeat Blastmon, but he is clearly not in top form and struggles in the fight. Finally Taiki and the others notice that Shoutmon`s behavior is strange, and begin to suspect that he`s up to something under the cover of night...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シャウトモン, キングの証!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki`s team visits another Zone that has been overtaken by the Bagra Army, the Sweets Zone. Matadormon, a Digimon with a giant sweet tooth, has taken the Code Crown and locked all the Zone`s patissiers inside the castle, forcing them to make sweets for him. Xros Heart enters the castle to save them by presenting Akari as a patissier and taking on the Bagra Army`s top patissier, WaruMonzaemon, in a sweets-making battle. Akari sets about making a cake, but runs into major difficulties...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sweets Zone! The Sweet-Toothed Digimon Battle!
スイーツゾーン! 甘党デジモンバトル!

REGULAR.description:
When they`re thrown into the Sweets Zone`s underground, Taiki`s team learns that they`ve entered the factory where the Bagra Army has been forcing local Digimon to build the ultimate weapon. Cutemon believes his parents are among the captives, so everyone sets out find them and free the Zone`s Digimon. However, the Bagra Army`s ultimate weapon, Breakdramon, is near completion. Xros Heart attacks in hope of stopping it, but matters are complicated when Matadormon shows up...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Ultimate Weapon Activates! You Can Do It, Cutemon!
最終兵器発動! がんばれキュートモン!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki`s team arrives in the Sword Zone, where swordsman Digimon test their skills in fair fights with one another. But then the Bagra Army`s swordsman unit, led by Grademon, launches an attack. Xros Heart defeats them and gains the Zone`s Code Crown, but then the dying Grademon is reborn as a good Digimon and, ashamed of his transformation, runs away. Soon Kiriha arrives and tells Taiki that he has just obtained the last of the Code Crowns, and that the Digital World has begun to reform. But then, finally, Tactimon appears and an epic battle begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taiki & Kiriha VS Bugra Army in an All-Out Showdown!
Taiki Kiriha VS Bugra-gun, Zenmen Kessen!
タイキ・キリハVSバグラ軍, 全面決戦!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki, Akari, and Zenjirou have been sent back to the human world, but their families don`t believe their stories of the Digital World. A Digital aura appears in the sky over Tokyo, and soon Taiki hears the same mysterious voice he heard on the day he received his Xros Loader. The voice tells him there is no hope left for the Digital World. Taiki decides to return there with Shoutmon and seeks the owner of the voice for help getting back. He then finds the DigiMemory of a knight who protected the Digital World, the owner of the voice - Omegamon. But before Omegamon can send Taiki back, Tactimon begins to rampage in the human world!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arata Naru Tabidachi!! Tokyo Dai Kessen!!
Embark on a New Adventure!! Decisive Battle in Tokyo!!
新たなる旅立ち!! 東京大決戦!!

WIKIPEDIA_JP: デジモンクロスウォーズ

titles.title: デジモンクロスウォーズ
